Name: Azure - Copy Storage Account Containers AZCopy Inline
Description: Copies Storage Account containers, from a source storage account to destination. It copies the containers with the same names.
Author: ahmedig

Parameters.Name: SourceStorageAccountName
Parameters.Label: Source Storage Account Name
Parameters.HelpText: Storage Account Name of the source storage account

Parameters.Name: SourceStorageAccountKey
Parameters.Label: Source Storage Account Key
Parameters.HelpText: Storage Account Key of the source storage account

Parameters.Name: DestinationStorageAccountName
Parameters.Label: Destination Storage Account Name
Parameters.HelpText: Storage Account Name of the destination storage account

Parameters.Name: DestinationStorageAccountKey
Parameters.Label: Destination Storage Account Key
Parameters.HelpText: Storage Account key of the destination storage account

Parameters.Name: ContainersIncluded
Parameters.Label: Containers Included
Parameters.HelpText: A comma separated list of containers that will be copied only, and all the rest will be excluded. If this value is filled with a value, the "Containers Excluded" value will be neglected.

Parameters.Name: ContainersExcluded
Parameters.Label: Containers Excluded
Parameters.HelpText: A comma separated list of containers that will be excluded. All containers in source storage account will be copied to destination except these containers. Please note that if the "Containers Included" has a value, the "Containers Excluded" will be neglected.
